review: we use this all the time. with some cool apps available I can stream video from the internet. Try out "Web Video Caster" from the android app store. You will thank me later!
author: GKL

review: I know enough about technology to say that either my chromecast doesn't work properly, or it's not fully compatible with my Samsung Led TV, which has not been stated by Google. It was working flawlessly (for a few days) until i tried to reset it. It never worked again. I followed every instruction in the troubleshooting process provided by google.
author: Gaston

review: Super easy to install and use. We use it with our Galaxy 5's and haven't had any problems at all. No complaints, just wished we had bought this sooner!
author: Michelle Rasor

review: Luv,luv,luv this device.  Easy set up, navigate, luv this device.  Downgraded my cable package.
author: donna lawson

review: It only works well with excellent wireless connection. If you are trying to using in an out of the way kind of bedroom, it does not work well. But it does if you have good wireless.
author: Javier Guerrero
